title: The #1 Way To Grab Your Competitor's KDP Keyword Strategy - Book Scout
description:
What if you could take your biggest competitor in the KDP space and know exactly what keywords they were ranking for that was leading to their success?

The Book Scout module from Book Bolt allows you to do just that! It will give you keywords that WORK, but most importantly, it will give you the competition, Amazon search volume per month, and the seasonality of these keywords.

https://bookbolt.io/book-scout-the-1-way-to-grab-your-competitors-keyword-strategy

Stop guessing in the dark and use keywords in your KDP book uploads that will actually work!
